heading: HB06111
0: AN ACT CREATING THE PHILIPPINE FARMER'S BANK, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES since 2020-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06111
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE PHILIPPINE FARMER'S BANK, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to establish the Philippine Farmers' Bank to provide for all kinds of credit system to the Filipino farmers, fisher folks, farm workers, growers of domesticated animals and any other agricultural activities most especially to those located in the unbanked and unserved areas for the purpose of supplying food in the nation.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-29
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2020-02-04
